english.segment1: Time takes ahold. I know your waiting. But now your fading from me
english.segment2: Hope against hope. I heard you calling out. But now your falling out of reach
english.segment3: Come back alright. Come back alright. Come back, i can't let you go
english.segment4: I want you to know. You were already. Already gone aren't you?. Already gone aren't you?. Already, i can't you go
english.segment5: Already gone aren't you?. Already gone aren't you?. Already, i can't you go

english.segment7: Time takes ahold. I hear you calling out. But now your falling out of reach
english.segment8: Come back alright (alright). Come back alright (alright). Come back, i can't let you go
english.segment9: I want you to know. You were already. Already gone aren't you?. Already gone aren't you?. Already, i can't you go
english.segment10: Already gone aren't you?. Already gone aren't you?. Already, i can't you go

english.segment12: Come back alright (alright). Come back alright (alright). Come back, i can't let you go
english.segment13: Already gone aren't you? (come back alright). Already gone aren't you? (come back alright). Already, i can't you go
